com.upgrad.pgpbde.project.map.reduce

Class SaavnStreamingMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<java.lang.Object,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,SaavnStreamingKey,SaavnStreamingValue>
      • com.upgrad.pgpbde.project.map.reduce.SaavnStreamingMapper

  • public class SaavnStreamingMapper
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<java.lang.Object,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,SaavnStreamingKey,SaavnStreamingValue>
    The SaavnStreamingMapper class is an implementation of the Mapper class which is used to filter the Saavn streaming data before it is sent to the partitioner class SaavnStreamingPartitioner .

    All the map output to be partitioned on a particular trendingDay is sent the partitioner class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper

        org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context

      An implementation of the map() method in the Mapper class SaavnStreamingMapper which filters the Saavn song streaming records and generates the map output in the following format:
      void writeMap(java.lang.String songId, int streamingDay, int songWeight, int trendDuration, org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
      This method writes map output based on the streamingDay and trending window defined.

      • map

        public void map(java.lang.Object key,
                org.apache.hadoop.io.Text value,
                org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
         throws java.io.IOException,
                java.lang.InterruptedException
        An implementation of the map() method in the Mapper class SaavnStreamingMapper which filters the Saavn song streaming records and generates the map output in the following format:

        { SaavnStreamingKey(day, id), SaavnStreamingValue(trendingDay, songWeight)}

        For example: {(25,vHtuvXz), (25, 1350)}
